subject: Soccer
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Ben Sahar, a 17-year-old striker whose nickname is the Kid, is expected to be at the nexus of his national team’s attack in Saturday’s Euro 2008 qualifier.
snippet: Ben Sahar, a 17-year-old striker whose nickname is the Kid, is expected to be at the nexus of his national team’s attack in Saturday’s Euro 2008 qualifier.
